name: smokescreen
effect: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Lowers the foe’s accuracy
using smoke, ink, etc.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Lowers the foe’s accuracy
using smoke, ink, etc.

of smoke or ink
reduces the foe’s
accuracy.
